alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Morgan and northern Magoffin Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williams, or near West Liberty, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wonnie, Lykins, Bloomington and Plutarch around 150 PM EDT. Bethanna, Kernie, Patton, Hager, Elsie, Epson, Netty, Licksburg, Burg and Wheel Rim around 155 PM EDT. Stella, Ova, Gullett, Gifford, Cutuno, Perlie and Cyrus around 200 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Salyersville, Fritz, Seiltz, Eugene, Puncheon, Dale, Stringtown, Mason, Hendricks, Lakesville, Cornelia, Burning Fork, Foraker, Bradley and Ivyton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
